about.me: Solutions Architect specializing in web applications. 15+ years in devops and server management.
about.server: dedicated Ryzen 7 4800H machine with additional backup servers (rPi4 8GB) in multiple locations. We are proud to guarantee high availability and resilience against power and connection outages. Our competitive fees ensure a high return of assets for our users.
about.company: Years of successful work, deep research, and timely updates behind the Cardano technology have proven a meticulous commitment to high values.
